name: magnetic-flux
effect: Raises the Defense and Special Defense of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage.
short_effect: Raises the Defense and Special Defense of all friendly Pokémon with plus or minus by one stage.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user manipulates magnetic fields, which raises the Defense and Sp. Def stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user manipulates magnetic fields, which raises the Defense and Sp. Def stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user manipulates magnetic fields, which raises the Defense and Sp. Def stats of ally Pokémon with the Plus or Minus Ability.
